nodes.text: A Wookiee remembrance bracelet was a type of interwoven bracelet. A number of them were owned by the Wookiees that lived in the village Kiirloor on the planet Cularin.
In From the Trees, if the player characters save Kiirloor from being destroyed by the Wyrd, then the Wookiees give them some Wookiee remembrance bracelets as tokens of their appreciation.
